data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In general, if a set of data structures needs to be included in linked lists, external storage is the best approach. If a set ____ data ____ need ____ be ____ in ____ one ____ list, then ____ storage ____ slightly ____, ____ a ____ linked ____ package ____ external ____ is ____. Likewise, if different sets of data that can be stored in the same data structure are to be included in a single linked list, then internal storage would be fine.
data.partBlankContent: In general, if a set of data structures needs to be included in linked lists, external storage is the best approach. If a set o_ data struc_____ need t_ be incl____ in on__ one lin___ list, then inte____ storage i_ slightly bet___, unl___ a gen____ linked li__ package us___ external sto____ is avai_____. Likewise, if different sets of data that can be stored in the same data structure are to be included in a single linked list, then internal storage would be fine.
data.answer: 通常，如果需要在链表中包含一组数据结构，则外部存储是最佳方法。如果一组数据结构只需要包含在一个链表中，那么内部存储稍微好一些，除非使用外部存储的通用链表包可用。同样，如果可以存储在同一个数据结构中的不同数据集要包含在一个链表中，那么内部存储就可以了。
